objects.name: Welcome
objects.string: Welcome to the training simulator of Nozama Inc.

content.text: Welcome to the training simulator of Nozama Inc.

objects.name: TutText1
objects.string: Your job is very simple, just drive and deliver all packages as soon as possible

content.text: Your job is very simple, just drive and deliver all packages as soon as possible

objects.name: TutText2
objects.string: Damages to the van will come out of your daily pay

content.text: Damages to the van will come out of your daily pay

objects.name: TutText3
objects.string: Once you are near a building that needs their package, just walk right in and drop it off

content.text: Once you are near a building that needs their package, just walk right in and drop it off

objects.name: TutText4
objects.string: Ok, do not throw packages at the building. Since this is a simulation, it will be a one-time excuse

content.text: Ok, do not throw packages at the building. Since this is a simulation, it will be a one-time excuse

objects.name: TutText5
objects.string: There are no bathroom breaks. We have left bottles in the van if you decide on using them

content.text: There are no bathroom breaks. We have left bottles in the van if you decide on using them

objects.name: TutText6
objects.string: If you decide on using them, your daily pay will be docked by the number of bottles you fill up

content.text: If you decide on using them, your daily pay will be docked by the number of bottles you fill up

objects.name: TutText7
objects.string: Great! You are now a prepared and proud member of Nozama Inc. We wish you the best of luck!

content.text: Great! You are now a prepared and proud member of Nozama Inc. We wish you the best of luck!
